About This Movie

Spectacular car and motorcycle stunts highlight this classic action film set in the near future. With the countryside terrorized by marauding cycle gangs, it's up to a small band of elite cops and their high-octane hot rods to protect citizens.

Cast and Crew

Starring: Mel Gibson , Joanne Samuel , Hugh Keays-Byrne , Steve Bisley , Tim Burns , Roger Ward

WriterJames McCausland , George Miller

DirectorGeorge Miller

ProducerByron Kennedy
